reviews.negative_feedback: KEEP YOUR VALUABLES ON YOU AT ALL TIMES. I'm partially to blame for putting too much trust in the owners/employees, but the cute and peaceful atmosphere made me feel at ease. I didn't think I'd have anything to worry about. I had some money rolled up in my wallet, which I hid in my clothes on a shelf inside the room when we went for a walk. We always locked the door, and the only people who had access were the cleaners who came in every day to take out the rubbish. I didn‚Äôt open my wallet until we were leaving, and that‚Äôs when I noticed it was partially open and all the money was gone. I contacted the owner, but she was unapologetic and insisted her employees were trustworthy because "she had worked with them for 14 years and they are honest people." However, after retracing all my steps, the only explanation is that someone came into the room while we were out and took the money. Be careful and don‚Äôt be too trusting. Ideally, don‚Äôt lose sight of anything valuable to you.
